content.raw: Still, with the amount of noise specified in the model I would not expect the y component of linear acceleration to range between 3-5 while the hand is still. The values for z could be acceptable if it's measuring acceleration from the force that is counteracting gravity, I guess, since they seem to range from 8 to 10. But I'm not convinced that the noise model matches up to the error we're actually seeing...
